entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C

Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 1:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow level lowering to 1900 metres this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
